QuestData.Title: Come Prepared
QuestData.Description: It's a short swim to the top. Not much trouble really. Hard to get any supplies up there though. Too heavy.$B$BAll of the ships in all of the Horde fleets stow a survival kit. I had a balloon from the old survival kit, but it fell on hard times recently. I need another survival kit.$B$BThere's a ship to the southeastish. Let's hope that the survivors were dumb and didn't take the survival kit. More survival kit for us.
QuestData.CompletionText: A whole big box of amazing! That's what it is. I need more amazing in my life.$B$BDon't worry, I'll share.
QuestData.RewardText: Let me see, let me see... flare gun... balloon... no rope. Never any rope. Terribly impractical if you do ask me. Rope should be mandatory.
